tal:block.h1: Creative Commons Salman Magnatune Remix Contest Sources
tal:block.p: The audio source files for several tracks from Zone's 'MADRUGADA' and Tamy's 'Sou Mais Bossa' albums are available here under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial license, so that producers worldwide can use the sounds in remixes and new compositions. The sources are available both as a selection of looped or, if you want to cut your own samples, some of the original solo tracks from the recording session are available as well.
In order to use these files you need an 'unzip' utility (for Windows we suggest the fine and free 7-zip) and the FLAC decoder.
You can download the a cappellas and pre-cut loops here. Right-click (Mac: control-click) on the buttons below and select 'Save Target As..'.
In addition to pre-cut loops you can cut your own samples from a selection out of the original studio tracks, including the a cappellas.
To download right click (control on Mac) on these buttons and select 'Save Target As...'
